message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.SY, cs.AR 

This paper discusses a new LLVM sanitizer for memory corruption vulnerabilities in C/C++ applications, which is relevant to computer security (cs.CR) and software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses the implementation of the sanitizer using metadata and instrumentation, which is relevant to programming languages (cs.PL). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of the sanitizer for system developers and critical systems, which is relevant to systems and control (cs.SY) and architecture (cs.AR).
